products.name: Safari Bundle
products.description:
Purchase this bundle and unlock 5 premium weapon skins to customize your loadout in coveted gold and animal skins.
The Safari bundle includes:
- The Gold weapon skin
- the Leopard weapon skin
- the Zebra weapon skin
- The Snake weapon skin
- The Tiger weapon skin
These skins can be applied to any weapon in your loadout.
products.originalDescription: Purchase this bundle and unlock 5 premium weapon skins to customize your loadout in coveted gold and animal skins. The Safari bundle includes: - The Gold weapon skin - the Leopard weapon skin - the Zebra weapon skin - The Snake weapon skin - The Tiger weapon skin These skins can be applied to any weapon in your loadout.

products.name: Gemstones Bundle
products.description: Bling out your arsenal and save with the Gemstone Bundle. This bundle unlocks all the Emerald, Cobalt, Amethyst, Platinum, Topaz, Cyan and Ruby weapon skins. You can apply these skins to any weapon in your loadout.
products.originalDescription: Bundle Gemstones

products.name: Ops Icon Charm Bundle
products.description: Unlock the Original 20 Operator's Icon charms for your weapons. These charms are universal and can be equipped on any weapon in your loadout.
products.originalDescription: Bundle Charms Vintage Ops

products.name: Emerald weapon skin
products.description: Forge your weapons in Emerald. This skin can be applied to any weapon in your loadout.
products.originalDescription: Forge your weapons in Emerald. This skin can be applied to any weapon in your loadout.

products.description: Forge your weapons in Cobalt. This skin can be applied to any weapon in your loadout.

products.name: RACER 04 BUNDLE
products.description: Wrap your FBI weapons in the Racer 04 weapon skin, with this bundle. Go to your loadout to equip this skin.
products.originalDescription: Wrap your FBI weapons in the Racer 04 weapon skin, with this bundle. Go to your loadout to equip this skin.

products.name: RACER 23 BUNDLE
products.description: Wrap your GIGN weapons in the Racer 23 weapon skin, with this bundle. Go to your loadout to equip this skin.
products.originalDescription: Wrap your GIGN weapons in the Racer 23 weapon skin, with this bundle. Go to your loadout to equip this skin.

products.name: GSG9 Racer Pack
products.description: Flaunt your style for everyone to see. Equip the GSG9 Racer weapon skins in your loadout.
products.originalDescription: Wrap your GSG9-specific weapons in unique Racer weapon skins. Make sure to leave a mark on your victim by flashing these exclusive skins whenever things are about to get serious.

products.name: Canadian Racer Pack
products.description: Wrap your JTF2 weapons in the Racer weapon skin. This pack unlocks the Racer weapon skin for all of your JTF2-specific weapons. Go to your loadout to equip this skin.
products.originalDescription: Wrap your JTF2 weapons in the Racer weapon skin. This pack unlocks the Racer weapon skin for all of your JTF2-specific weapons. Go to your loadout to equip this skin.

products.name: USA Racer Pack
products.description: Wrap your Navy SEAL specific weapons in the Racer weapon skin. This pack unlocks the Racer weapon skin for all of your Navy SEAL-specific weapons. Go to your loadout to equip this skin.
products.originalDescription: Wrap your Navy SEAL specific weapons in the Racer weapon skin. This pack unlocks the Racer weapon skin for all of your Navy SEAL-specific weapons. Go to your loadout to equip this skin.

products.name: British Racer Pack
products.description: Wrap your SAS weapons in the Racer weapon skin. This bundle unlocks the Racer weapon skin for all of your SAS specific weapons.
products.originalDescription: Wrap your SAS weapons in the Racer weapon skin. This bundle unlocks the Racer weapon skin for all of your SAS specific weapons.

products.name: Russian Racer Pack
products.description: Wrap your Spetsnaz weapons in the Racer weapon skin. This pack unlocks the Racer weapon skin for all of your Spetsnaz-specific weapons. Go to your loadout to equip this skin.
products.originalDescription: Wrap your Spetsnaz weapons in the Racer weapon skin. This pack unlocks the Racer weapon skin for all of your Spetsnaz-specific weapons. Go to your loadout to equip this skin.

products.name: Kapkan's AC Set
products.description: The Kapkan Assassins Creed set is now available. Represent the Creed with Kapkans AC headgear, charm, and weapon skin.
products.originalDescription: The Kapkan Assassins Creed set is now available. Represent the Creed with Kapkans AC headgear, charm, and weapon skin.

products.name: Ash Watch_Dogs Set
products.description: The Ash Watch_Dogs set is now available. Make Ash embody a highly skilled hacker with Aiden Pearce's Scarf, Watch_Dogs charm and weapon skin.
products.originalDescription: The Ash Watch_Dogs set is now available. Make Ash embody a highly skilled hacker with Aiden Pearce's Scarf, Watch_Dogs charm and weapon skin.

products.name: Frost The Division set
products.description: Frosts The Division set is now available. Make Frost embody a member of the Strategic Homeland Division spirit with the Division Mask, weapon skin and charm.
products.originalDescription: Set Ubisoft TD Frost

products.name: CASTLE FC3 BUNDLE
products.description: The Castle Far Cry 3 Blood Dragon set is now available. Make Castle embody Sergeant Rex power Colt with the FC3 Blood Dragon headgear, UMP45 Blood Dragon weapon skin, and charm.
products.originalDescription: Set Ubisoft FC Castle

products.name: Fuze Recon Set
products.description: The Fuze Ghost Recon set is now available. Make Fuze embody the U.S. Army Special Forces soldiers from Delta Company with the Ghost Recon headgear, AK12 Ghost Recon weapon skin, and charm. Visit the Shop section for more details.
products.originalDescription: Set Ubisoft GR Fuze

products.name: ROOK THE CREW SET
products.description: Rook's The Crew set is now available. Make Rook embody an agile racing driver with the Crew headgear, P90 The Crew weapon skin, and charm.
products.originalDescription: Set Ubisoft TC Rook

products.name: MONTAGNE BUSHIDO SET
products.description: Montagne's Bushido Set is now available. Unlock the exclusive Fugaku skin for Le Roc Extendable Shield, Suji Kabuto headgear and Fujisan charm for Montagne.

products.name: BLITZ BUSHIDO SET
products.description: Blitz's Bushido Set is now available. Unlock the exclusive Denko Sekka skin for G52 Tactical Shield, Hoshi Kabuto headgear and Taiyou charm for Blitz.

products.name: PULSE BUSHIDO SET
products.description: Pulse's Bushido Set is now available. Unlock the exclusive Cherry Drift skin for UMP45, Kabuki Somen headgear and Uzu charm for Pulse.

products.name: SMOKE BUSHIDO SET
products.description: Smoke's Bushido Set is now available. Unlock the exclusive Dragon's Breath skin for FMG-9, Kamakiri headgear and Tokeiso charm for Smoke.

products.name: TACHANKA BUSHIDO SET
products.description: Tachanka's Bushido Set is now available. Unlock the exclusive Russet Steel skin for 9x19VSN, Hoshi Oni headgear and Gunba charm for Tachanka.

products.name: CASTLE FOOTBALL HELMET
products.description: Crown your team captain with the Castle Football Helmet. This unlocks the Team Castle headgear, featuring Castle's personal logo in lustrous orange and black.

products.name: BANDIT FOOTBALL HELMET
products.description: Crown your team captain with the Bandit Football Helmet. This unlocks the Team Bandit headgear, featuring Bandit's personal logo in brilliant golden yellow and slate gray.

products.name: BUCK GHOST RECON WILDLANDS SET
products.description: Engage in unconventional warfare with the Buck Ghost Recon Wildlands Set. Unlock Buck's Ghost headgear, Santa Muerte charm and Ghost Shadow weapon skin for the C8-SFW assault rifle.

products.name: SMOKE WD2 SET
products.description: Hack the planet with Smoke Watch Dogs 2 Set. Unlock Smoke's Wrench headgear, Thunder Ball charm and Paralysis weapon skin for the FMG-9 submachine Gun.

products.name: THERMITE MILITARY POLICE SET
products.description: Protect and serve with the Thermite Military Police Set. Unlock the MP Helmet and MP Fatigues for Thermite, along with the MP Brassard charm and Marine Corps MP weapon skin for the 556xi assault rifle.
products.originalDescription: Protect and serve with the Thermite Military Police Set. Unlock the MP Helmet and MP Fatigues for Thermite, along with the MP Brassard charm and Marine Corps MP weapon skin for the 556xi assault rifle.

products.name: ASH ENGINEERING SET
products.description: Multiply your force with the Ash Engineering Set. Equip the IDF Sapper headgear and uniform for Ash, along with the RDX charm and Combat Engineer weapon skin for the G36C assault rifle.

products.name: CAPITO LORETO SET
products.description: Get lost in the jungle with the Capito Loreto Set. Includes the Loreto headgear and uniform for Capito, along with the Shaman charm and Esperanza weapon skin for the M249 LMG.

products.name: MUTE GRAVEL BLAST SET
products.description: Break up your profile with the Mute Gravel Blast Set. Get Mute's Gravel Blast headgear, uniform and weapon skin for the MP5K submachine gun, along with the Dusky charm.

products.name: JGER COVERT SET
products.description: Go undetected with the Jger Covert Set. Includes the Nightfall uniform and weapon skin for the 416-C assault rifle, along with the Multi-Vision headgear and Splinter Seal charm.

products.name: PULSE DESERT GRIT SET
products.description: Brave the heat with the Pulse Desert Grit Set. Get the Desert Grit uniform and weapon skin for the M1014 shotgun, as well as the Saguaro headgear and Seymour charm.

products.name: CAPITO DETAINEE SET
products.description: Revisit our Operator's past with Capito's Detainee Set. Get Souza's Eye charm, the Unbreakable uniform, Tortured headgear, and the Ambushed weapon skin for the PARA-308 assault rifle.

products.name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege Year 3 Pass
products.description: The Y3 Pass grants access to a one-year* VIP premium membership: 8 Year 3 operators with 7-day early access, Exclusive customization items, 600 R6 Credits, 10% off in shop, 5% Renown boost, 0,3% Alpha Pack Boost. *VIP Membership ends January 31, 2019. **10% discount only applies to purchases made with Renown or R6 Credits. Tom Clancys Rainbow Six Siege is mandatory to play the game.

products.name: PULSE SKY-HIGH SET
products.description: Swoop down on your target with Pulse's Sky-High Set. Includes his Combat Ready charm, Airman uniform, Falcon headgear, and Warbird weapon skin for the UMP45 submachine gun.

products.name: Pro League Caveira Set
products.description: Celebrate the Rainbow Six Siege Pro League with Caveira's Gold Set. Show your e-Sports enthusiasm with the Gold Caveira Chibi charm, Circumstellar weapon skin for the M12 submachine gun, Trailblazer headgear, and Lightspeed uniform.

products.name: Pro League Jackal Set
products.description: Celebrate the Rainbow Six Siege Pro League with Jackal's Gold Set. Show your e-Sports enthusiasm with the Gold Jackal Chibi charm, Lightspeed uniform, Optic Burn headgear, and Circumstellar weapon skin for the PDW9 submachine gun.

products.name: Pro League Blackbeard Set
products.description: Celebrate the Rainbow Six Siege Pro League with Blackbeard's Gold Set. Show your e-Sports enthusiasm with the Gold Blackbeard Chibi charm, Circumstellar weapon skin for the Mk17 CQB assault rifle, Hydrostatic headgear, and Lightspeed uniform.

products.name: Pro League Ela Set
products.description: Celebrate the Rainbow Six Siege Pro League with Ela's Gold Set. Show your e-Sports enthusiasm with the Gold Ela Chibi charm, Circumstellar weapon skin for the Scorpion EVO 3 carbine, Polarize headgear, and Lightspeed uniform.

products.name: Pro League All Sets
products.description: Celebrate Rainbow Six Sieges Pro League and unlock all the exclusive Pro League Sets for Caveira, Blackbeard, Jackal, and Ela.

psps.title: Steam
psps.description: Steam guarantees the safety and confidentiality of your transaction.
psps.longDescription: You will be redirected to the Steam server, which guarantees the security and confidentiality of the transaction.

psps.title: Boleto Bancario
psps.description: Visit one of your local retailers and pay cash or any other eligible payment method.
psps.longDescription:
Choose your favorite payment method with our partner UOL BoaCompra.
As part of UOL, BoaCompra is the leading payment company for online games in Brazil. By using BoaCompra's local payment methods, players enjoy rapid and secure check out, with the fastest processing time for Boletos. For even faster check-out, register and top-up a BoaCompra GOLD account for immediate purchases, with instant processing time. BoaCompra's easy, fast and secure payment system minimizes time and hassle so you get back to the game and play.
